text: Joris Chougrani (born 30 March 1991) is a French professional footballer who plays as left-back for Rodez AF. ==Professional career== Chougrani is a youth product of Rodez AF, having joined the club at the age of 12. He made his professional debut with Rodez in a 2–0 Ligue 2 win over AJ Auxerre on 26 July 2019. ==Personal life== Born in France, Chougrani is of Algerian descent. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lot (department) Category:Association football fullbacks Category:French footballers Category:French people of Algerian descent Category:Rodez AF players Category:Ligue 2 players Category:Championnat National players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Championnat National 3 players
title: Joris Chougrani
